name: InRoad truck racing overkill: combat & destroy racing game
name_original: InRoad truck racing overkill: combat & destroy racing game
description:
InRoad Racing Overkill is the new entry in Combat racing genre. This high thriller shooting racing game will put your driver skills, your racing skills on real road test. As heavy truck driver dodge the cars, shooting the road traffic to disappear from road. Your mosnter truck has high powered rocket launchers and machine guns, shoot the rocket on your rival racers, spree the bullets and make them disappear from the highway.
Always keep your eyes on emunition, your nitrous, and the money you are collecting.

Guns Reloading
You get gun reloaded on start and will alos get more fire power on the way. and Yes you can buy fire power from the store

Nitro
You will get nitro in return of coins you earn. If not enough but nitro from the store. Overtake the other racer in traffic and put and end to this madness.

Magnets
More magnets you get, more chances to earn money. Buy magnets froms store.

Feature Outline

-> Change camera angle to your best of liking.
-> High stake combat racing game
-> full speed thriller car shooting
-> Killing combination of Nitro, Magnets and Machine Guns
-> Unlimted endless adrenaline rush
-> stunning 3d road and traffic

How to Play

-> Tilt to steer the monstor truck
-> Use shoot button to clear the way by destroying the traffic
-> Use nitro to sprint
-> Use Brake to slow down the InRoad truck.
